channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 14, 2023
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-14-2023) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Beam Saber_ * _Hollows_ * _Masks_ * _Mountain Home_ * _Primetime Adventures_ * _Star Trek Adventures_ * _Stellar Conflict_ * _The Between_ * _The King's Poisoner_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players! If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://app.playabl.io/communities/the_open_hearth) to play!

@flatvurm wrote:
